title: Bitcoin drops 8% as Trump’s tariff war with China rattles global markets
description: NEW YORK – Bitcoin, the world’s biggest cryptocurrency, dropped 8.4% on Friday after US President Donald Trump intensified his trade fight with China. Trump announced 100% tariffs on Chinese exports to the US and new export controls on “critical software,” following China’s limits on rare earth exports used in tech and manufacturing.
